title: He khawvel dam lai thlaler chhumpui zing hnuaiah hian
lyrics:
He khawvel dam lai thlaler chhumpui zing hnuaiah hian,
Sual tinreng leh lungngaihnaten min hual vel a;
Nimahsela, ka Chhandamtu,
I chanchin mawi ka lo hriatin,
Ka lungngaihna zawng zawng lawmin a chantir thin.

Chanchin mawi ka tan lawmna,
Chanchin Tha ka tan damna;
Ka Lal thuthlung ropui ber a ni,
Aw, ka tan damna.

Sual thlipui leh ramhuaiten min hual vel mah sela,
Ka Chhandamtu'n a hmangaihna kulhpui chhungah,
Ka thlarau hliam a hruai ang a;
Ka Tlantu Thutiam nghet tak chu
Eng mahin a dang zo lo, aw, hmangaihna hi.

A hmangaihna hming ropui chauh ka tan a hlu,
Kei mi sual, riangvai, rethei, nung tlak lo te hi,
Chatuan pialral kawng min hawnsak;
A thisen hlu thianghlim tak chu,
Thinlungin min hmuhtir rawh, aw, ka Lal Isu.
